Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets (AF_NETLINK). MIT Licensed.

Name: consrv
Description: Command consrv is a SSH to serial console bridge server, originally designed for deployment on gokrazy.org devices. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: sdnotify
Description: Package sdnotify implements systemd readiness notifications as described in https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/sd_notify.html. MIT Licensed.

Name: schedgroup
Description: Package schedgroup provides a goroutine worker pool which schedules tasks to be performed at or after a specified time. MIT Licensed.

Name: socket
Description: Package socket provides a low-level network connection type which integrates with Go's runtime network poller to provide asynchronous I/O and deadline support. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: wireguard_exporter
Description: Command wireguard_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for WireGuard devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: zedhook
Description: zedhook provides a ZEDLET (ZFS Event Daemon Linkage for Executable Tasks) and zevent receiver server to monitor and log ZFS events produced by ZED. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: netx
Description: A collection of small Go networking packages. MIT Licensed.

Name: stream
Description: File storage and an issue tracker for stream topic suggestions for Matt's Twitch stream. MIT Licensed.

Name: taskstats
Description: Package taskstats provides access to Linux's taskstats interface, for sending per-task and per-process statistics from the kernel to userspace.  MIT Licensed.

Name: metricslite
Description: Package metricslite implements a lightweight, testable metrics interface focused on Prometheus metrics. MIT Licensed.

Name: wifi
Description: Package wifi provides access to IEEE 802.11 WiFi device actions and statistics.  MIT Licensed.
